# Add OAuth Authentication (Google, GitHub)

## Description
Implement OAuth authentication providers to give users more sign-in options.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Google OAuth integration
- [ ] (Optional) GitHub OAuth integration
- [ ] Proper redirect handling after OAuth callback
- [ ] Link OAuth accounts to existing email accounts

## Setup Steps
1. Configure OAuth credentials in provider console
2. Add credentials to Supabase Dashboard → Authentication → Providers
3. Re-add OAuth buttons to login/signup pages
4. Test OAuth flow end-to-end

## Notes
OAuth code was removed to simplify initial setup. Previous implementation exists in git history.
